meanings.definition: A woman who possesses a million or more units of the local currency.
meanings.sent1: The town celebrated the arrival of the new millionairesses with a grand parade.
meanings.sent2: The group of successful millionairesses invested in various businesses.
meanings.sent3: The millionairesses decided to have a race to see who could spend their money the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the land of millionairesses, even the flowers seemed to bloom brighter.
meanings.sent5: The mansion of the millionairesses gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of their wealth.

meanings.sent1: The charity event was attended by many generous millionairesses.
meanings.sent2: The magazine featured a list of the world's most influential millionairesses.
meanings.sent3: The millionairesses threw a lavish party to celebrate their success.
meanings.sent4: Among the bustling city streets, the millionairesses stood out with their elegant attire.
meanings.sent5: The community admired the philanthropic efforts of the local millionairesses.
